Name: Zadoki's Group
description:
Zadoki's Group is formed by 13 farmers in Kimilili District and is being represented by Zadoki, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 55 years old and has 5 children.

Zadoki has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is often referred to as a very friendly person.

Zadoki isnâ€™t new to One Acre Fund, he actually joined the program in 2014 and has since noticed his life has changed; especially in the sense that he has been able to consistently feed his family ever since.

This year, Zadoki will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan but will also purchase a solar light. He is very excited about this addition since now he will be able to have an overall improved quality of life.

Using this loan, Zadoki's Group will purchase a total of 9 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 8.25 acres.
